Hence, the lowest bin of the Qr distribution is approximated in the NLO prediction by its average value in the interval 0 < Qr < Q7?, computed by integration of the asymptotic approximations. The phase-space slicing procedure is sufficient for predictions of observables inclusive in Qr, but not of the shape of do/dQr distributions.
